addProviderToAccessList(address).details: Adds a provider to the access list

creationBlock().details: Returns the creation block of the deal

deposit(uint256).details: Deposits payment token to the deal

getComputeUnit(bytes32).details: Returns the compute unit info by ID

getComputeUnitCount().details: Returns total number of compute units

getComputeUnitCount(address).details: Returns the compute units by provider

getComputeUnits().details: Returns the compute units info by provider

getFreeBalance().details: Returns the free balance of the deal

getRewardAmount(bytes32).details: Returns the reward amount by compute unit ID

getStatus().details: Returns the status of the deal

getWorkerCount().details: Returns the worker count. Worker is a compute unit that has a worker ID

isComputePeerExist(bytes32).details: Returns the boolean flag indicating whether the peer exists in the deal

isProviderAllowed(address).details: Returns the boolean indicating whether the provider is allowed or not

maxWorkersPerProvider().details: Returns the max number of workers per provider

minWorkers().details: Returns the min number of workers

pricePerWorkerEpoch().details: Returns the price per worker per epoch

removeProviderFromAccessList(address).details: Removes a provider from the access list

setWorker(bytes32,bytes32).details: Set worker ID for a compute unit. Compute unit can have only one worker ID

targetWorkers().details: Returns the max number of workers

withdrawRewards(bytes32).details: Withdraws rewards from the deal by compute unit ID

@dev Emitted when a owner withdraws payment token from the deal

@dev Emitted when a max paid epoch is updated
@dev Emitted when a deal is ended. This event can be emitted in the not-ended epoch. It can be emitted after the ended epoch in any epoch
@dev Deposits payment token to the deal
@dev Withdraws payment token from the deal
@dev Returns the status of the deal
@dev Returns the free balance of the deal
@dev Returns the reward amount by compute unit ID
@dev Removes a compute unit from the deal
@dev Withdraws rewards from the deal by compute unit ID
@dev Set worker ID for a compute unit. Compute unit can have only one worker ID
